description:
Use NeonTooltip to display tooltips or popovers. It is recommended that tooltip content should be kept to a single line. Use the popover style for larger content.

To use NeonTooltip provide the target and content slots.

props.name: tooltipStyle
props.description: Style of the tooltip, use Tooltip for a simple tooltip, use Popover for larger more complex content.

props.name: outlineStyle
props.description: Style of the outline to use when the tooltip target has focus, use text for tooltips wrapping text and border for tooltips wrapping "block" elements, e.g. buttons.

props.name: outlineColor
props.description: Color of the tooltip target when it is focussed.

props.name: placementContainer
props.description: Restrict placement to within this container.

slots.name: target
slots.description: the tooltip target, i.e. the text, icon or otherwise which when hovered over triggers the tooltip to open
